summary: An internal FBI email forwarding an RSVP questionnaire and logistical requests for a victim and her 4-year-old daughter to attend an event at the Miami field office on October 14, 2019. The victim requires lodging, train transportation, and local transport assistance, and states she lacks financial resources to pay out of pocket.

persons.name: Program Manager
persons.context: Sends the forwarded RSVP questionnaire and logistical details regarding a victim's travel and accommodation needs for an event at the Miami FBI field office.

events.title: Victim's Scheduled Attendance at FBI Event
events.description: A victim and her 4-year-old daughter are scheduled to attend an event at the FBI's Miami field office, requiring lodging, train travel from West Palm Beach to Miami, and local transportation.

keyFacts: A victim of the Epstein case required FBI assistance for travel and lodging to attend an event at the Miami field office on October 14, 2019.
The victim stated she did not have the financial resources to pay for any expenses out of pocket.
The victim's 4-year-old daughter was also attending, and a support person had an expired/suspended license, raising a potential access issue for the field office.
Transportation plans involved the victim driving to her mother's home, then taking the Brightline train from West Palm Beach to Miami.
